page.title: 20Seghill
page.content: The{population}of Seghill is now 1 760 adults and 450 children. The old village, linear in shape, is now expanding to include private developments. However many residents, particularly the young,feel that there are few{facilities}for recreation. A group of unemployed youngsters have set up their own youth club in a hut.It is open to anyone aged between 4 and 19 years, and although it may not look much, it is seen as a way of keeping off the streets and out of trouble. The Institute, which is a social centre, caters mainly for adults, old people in particular, providing Bingo, Whist drives etc. {Pages 1 to 19 by 2nd to 5th year {children of Seaton Delaval First {School, page 20 by 4th year children {from Seaton Sluice Middle School. { }
